samodhanika guwan aarakshaka jalaya siriyawa thula sthapitha karanne okthombar masa 20 daya.me sandaha awashya upakarana saha puhunu karana lada siriyanu karya mandalayan rusiyawa wisin danatamath sapaya di thibe.siriyawa thula sitina rusiyanu hamudawala ilektronik sangramika hakiyawan wadidiyunu kara athayida amathyawaraya kiya.siriyawata bahulawama prahara ella wana pradhana dishawan ki.mi. 200 durakata rusiyanu hamuda wisin nirikshanaya karamin sitiyi.

yam kisi yakshayek awith niwasa wala salakunak dama yana bawath,ema niwase inna surupi yowun tharuniyak ema yakata bili diya yuthu bawath,ese nowunahoth yaka mulu ratama wanasana bawath oya athare rate pracharaya karawanawa.eeta passe rajathuma niwedanaya karanawa salakunu dama athi gewalwala inna yuwathiyan raja purushayanta bara denna kiyala yakata bili denna.onna ithin pahuwadata raja purushayo yakata bili denna kiyala kello ussan gihin raja thumata denawa.raja thuma mulinma tharuniyawa kelesala ohuge hithawathuntath dila marala danawa...

papa kriyawan samajayata ayahapatha pinisa hethuwana dewalya.budurajanan wahanse penwa denne anuwana pudgalaya thamange dana ugathkam saha isurumath bawa pawa thamange ayahapatha pinisama yodawana bawaya.dambaadiwa chiththa namathi situwarayek wasaya kaleya.
eka diyaniyak wiwaha wela inne nawika hamudawe sebalaku ekka.
eeke thahanamak na.
ehi dakwa aththe parlimenthuwa wisurawa harime sudanamak pilibanda atham sanwidhanathmaka kandayam katayuthu karana bawaya.
eekata ithin apita karanna deyak na thama.

melesa warin wara sanshodhanaya kala da aagnya panathe adupadu bohomayak pawathina bawa amathiwaraya pawasiya.aagnya panatha sanshodhanaya kirima sandaha wishesha kamituwak pathkara athi bawath, nawa sanshodhanaya anuwa warimarga aarakshawa thahawuru kirima, jala poshitha pradesha aaraksha kirima, rakshitha pradeshawala anawasara padinchikaruwan iwath kirima, jala dushanaya walakwima, ese karannanta nithiya kriyathmaka kirimata awashya prathipadana gana da awadhanaya yomu karana bawa siripala da silwa mahatha pawasiya.panath sanshodhanaya sandaha janatha adahas labaganimata piyawara ganna bawada amathiwaraya kiweya.nithipathi departhamenthuwa wenuwen aruna shanthada silwa, warimarga adhyaksha janaral aacharya ji. ji. ee. godaliyadda mahathwarun athulu niladharin rasak sahabhagi wi sitiyaha..
mama hemin aro diha baluwe ena yana bas athulata aha dagena maluwa godata gaththa wage noiwasillen inna welawaka.
me anuwa mema goma kuruminiyan purna rupantharanayakata lak wana bawa hondin pahadili we.
